sentences.en: Due to low level of productive forces and maladministration, other measures didn't take effect obviously.
sentences.cn: 其他措施在当时也曾起到一定作用,但由于生产力水平较低及管理不善等因素,效果并不理想.

sentences.en: He accused the local authority of maladministration.
sentences.cn: 他指责当地政府管理不善。

sentences.en: The mammoth size of village levies has historically been one of the major symptoms of maladministration.
sentences.cn: 历史上最大的病政之一,是村款的浩大.

sentences.en: This definition excludes accidental or deliberate excessive dosage or maladministration.
sentences.cn: 这一定义排除有意或意外的过量用药和用药不当.
